text: Tri-City Jewish Cemetery, also known as the B'nai Ameth Cemetery, is located above Rockingham Road in the West End of Davenport, Iowa. It is located on a very steep hill. The place has had some problems with littering likely caused by younger citizens with beer cans being left at the landmark. ==References== Category:Geography of Davenport, Iowa Category:Cemeteries in Iowa Category:Jewish cemeteries in the United States Category:Protected areas of Scott County, Iowa
title: Tri-City Jewish Cemetery (Davenport, Iowa)
